text: “Ndipo pamene adatsekula katundu wawo, adapeza chuma chawo chabwezedwa kwa iwo. Adati: “E bambo wathu! Tingafunenso chiyani (kwa munthu waufuluyu)? Ichi chuma chathu chabwezedwa kwa ife; ndipo tikabweretsa chakudya chothandizira mawanja athu; ndipo m’bale wathu tikamsunga; tikapezanso muyeso wangamira imodzi yoonjezera. Umenewu ndi mlingo wochepa (kwa mfumu ya ufuluyo).”
